contest-event.event-date:
Oct. 14, 1899 D Leicester Contest (Second Section)
Leicester Contest (Second Section) 0 Own Choice Test Piece Contest
leicester-contest-second-section-1
None
Own Choice from a Specified List
Floral Hall, Leicester 1st prize value £21. 2nd prize value £17.10s. 3rd prize value £14. 4th prize value £9. 5th prize silver cup. 16 bands competed. The majority played Lucia di Lammermoor, the others Songs of the Sea or Gems of Scotia
April 19, 2012, 9:13 p.m. July 28, 2019, 3:24 p.m.

3 Bestwood Colliery George Hames Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
4 Derby Sax and Tuba Alfred R. Seddon Gems of Scotia
5 Matlock Band L. Wildgoose Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
6 Leicester Highfields Thomas Seddon Songs of the Sea
7 Selby Town Squire Firth Songs of the Sea
8 East Kirkby United Angus Holden Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
8 Peterborough Thomas Seddon Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
10 Kirkby Colliery Welfare Band Sam Taylor Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
11 Birstall Old Tom Stubley Songs of the Sea
12 Woodcock Wells Richard Sourbutts Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
13 Grimsby Borough Band Fenton Renshaw Lucia di Lammermoor - Selection [arr. Round]
14 Great Wigston United J. Boulter Gems of Scotia

15 Doncaster Temperance Fenton Renshaw Gems of Modern Melody
